para.text: An athlete agent shall retain the following records for a period of 5 years:
The name and address of each individual represented by the athlete agent;
Any agency contract entered into by the athlete agent; and
Any direct costs incurred by the athlete agent in the recruitment or solicitation of a student-athlete to enter into an agency contract.
Records required by subsection (a) of this section to be retained are open to inspection by the Mayor during normal business hours.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 13 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act.
